name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Operation Krabby Patty
description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Operation Krabby Patty is an action game developed by AWE Games. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by THQ. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play SpongeBob SquarePants: Operation Krabby Patty on PC.
